====Compounds====
* {{ja-l|桔梗|ききょう|kikyō}}: the {{vern|platycodon}} or [[Chinese bellflower]], ''[[Platycodon grandiflorus]]''
* {{ja-l|桔木|はねぎ|hanegi}}: a [[wooden]] [[lever]] used to remove something; part of a [[roof]]; part of a [[ship]]'s [[stern]]
* {{ja-l|桔槹}} ({{ja-l|きっこう}}, {{ja-l|||kikkō}}; {{ja-l|けっこう}}, {{ja-l|||kekkō}}): alternate for {{ja-l|撥ね釣瓶}}, {{ja-l|撥釣瓶|はねつるべ|hanetsurube}}: an early kind of device using a long [[pole]] with a [[counterbalance]] as a [[lever]] to get [[water]] out of a [[well]]
